p: Because ribavirin remains neutral at pH 2, it does not interact with the Strata-X C cartridge and elutes during application of the extract and the washing procedure. The other antiviral compounds are positively charged at pH 2 and therefore are retained. Only zanamivir, having the lowest p K a of all the antiviral compounds (p K a 3.8), shows 10% breakthrough during the washing procedure which is considered acceptable. The Strata-X C cartridge is considered suitable for the clean-up of all antiviral drugs included except for ribavirin.
